place_description:
At Veni Vidi Vici, we blend the comfort of freshly brewed coffee, soothing teas, and delightful baked goodies with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Our mission is to create a space where friends meet, stories are shared, and every sip and bite brings pure joy. Whether you're craving a morning latte, a refreshing tea, or a slice of heaven in the form of a pastry, we’ve got a spot just for you.

Come in, relax, and let’s make every moment a bit sweeter. Conquer your cravings and enjoy the taste of happiness – it’s always a treat at Veni Vidi Vici!”

reviews_data.review_text: Best product and atmosphere in a coffee shop ever! I don't live in Kannapolis but will be returning next time I visit
Afternoon coffee and cookie, perfect ok a summer stormy day. I've been looking for a good comfortable cafe and I'm happy to have found one tucked away.

Nestled in the heart of downtown Kannapolis, NC Veni Vidi Vici Cafe stands as a beacon for coffee enthusiasts and pastry lovers alike. From the moment you step through the door, the inviting aroma of freshly brewed coffee and the warm, rustic ambiance welcome you into a haven of comfort and culinary delight.

The atmosphere at Veni Vidi Vici Cafe is truly unmatched. Their cozy and homie decorated space is the ideal spot to catch up with friends, have a productive work session, or simply unwind with a good book. Soft lighting, comfortable seating, and a playlist of mellow tunes create an environment that feels like a home away from home.
Such a cute little cafe! The owner Will is so kind and down to earth.  I ordered the banana foster iced latte and a brownie topped with a heath bar!  AMAZING! I will definitely be back.

Una experiencia muy placentera relajante la que se siente y se vive en ese lugar sus duenos son personas muy amables y conversadores  una se siente como en casa, rico cafe exquisitos  postres no dejen de visitarlo  cuan bengan a Kanaplis Nor Carolina

Our book club met here (first visit for all of us), and it was amazing! Will was very welcoming, warm, and personable. He made sure we were not only comfortable, but also pampered. We were given a personalized coffee experience (he allowed us to sample different flavors), and we had the opportunity to try different baked goods the shop offered (all delicious). If you're looking for a small-town coffee shop experience, you can't get better than this! They will make you feel like a regular after one visit. Do yourself a favor and stop in sometime!
Best banana nut bread I've ever had!
Loved discovering this homey cafe in my brief time in Kannapolis!! Such a cozy atmosphere and great conversation, I would love to bring friends here in the future!

Wonderful spot for a cozy afternoon. The owner is so friendly and open - I went on a day they were closed just to take a look as I was passing through town and when he spotted me, he opened up shop just to make me a cup! Definitely recommend and will make the trip to be back again!

Absolutely love coming here. They always make you feel at home and comfortable whether you're there for a Togo order or just to enjoy one of their coffees and many bakery items. They were able to do gender reveal cupcakes for me when my friend got her results. They were absolutely delicious and made exactly how we wanted them. Order with them or just stop in and say hello. You won't be disappointed:)

We were driving through on our way home from Charlotte and lucked into finding this place. The coffee and food were delicious, the owner is beyond warm, and the vibe is on point! We particularly loved the pay it forward board - we bought a snack and coffee for whoever wants it! We'll definitely return whenever we're in the area!

I order from here often. Everything is always good and they don't overcharge for their drinks. I usually get a vanilla iced latte and banana bread. If you haven't tried the chocolate banana bread, you are missing out. Seriously, I look forward to this banana bread and I believe it can cure the unhappiness in the world
Great atmosphere and great experience wonderful owner.
This place checks all of the boxes. Delicious coffee, cute store and friendly service. Plus, it's very inexpensive compared to other places nowadays! We will definitely be back.

They made a cake for my daughter in laws baby shower and it was absolutely delicious!! The flavor was just perfect. The icing was made just right! Not to sweet at all. I highly recommend you give them a try

Been here twice now within a week. Miss Amanda made me one of the best Caramel Macchiato's I have ever had Wednesday night, and she followed it up with an equally phenomenal one this morning!!! Mr Will kept the atmosphere lively and fun. Can't wait to bring my family and friends!!! The peach muffin I ate this morning was top notch!!! I found my new favorite local coffee spot!!!
Favorite coffee shop!
Ehat an absolute gem! Love the place and people...come in and enjoy a relaxed comfortable time!

Ive maintained a great professional business relationship with the owners for a little over year +. They've made personal exceptions for me, as a customer.

Will, was as generous to open his business to me, while he wasn't serving the public. Allowing me to host a private event, for my family.

Prepared all the desserts and volunteered to cater all of our needs, no time frame. I am extremely thankful and gracious for this business.

Every Saturday - when I come for a new and refreshing beverage - I observe and notice the personal interactions of all the customers.

Diverse. Friendly. Personal. Approachable.

Whether I stay local or relocate - their business cards will remain on person. Pinned, placed, slipped into every place they can fit.

This is such an adorable little spot, very cozy, the coffee and pastries are great, and the people who work there are so sweet! We go enough that we're on our second punch card and the quality never wavers. There's nice indoor seating and a fire pit outside, it's a great little date spot!

Lo mejor de lo mejor!! El lugar es increiblemente y te hacen sentir como en casa, excelentes
Personas y el cafe es lo mejor me la bolita mundial
Great place and great people!!
Best coffee, made to YOUR taste and preferences. Let him do his thing and he will hook you up right. Friendly and comfortable atmosphere to just hang out, relax or meet your best friends.
I like the batista and her enthusiasm. It is warm inside and the drink was pretty good. I could've stayed awhile. The atmosphere was welcoming.
So cozy! Love the vanilla chai latte
Great environment, lovely people.
Amazing people run this place. The coffee's great, but the real treasure is the welcoming atmosphere.
This place is wonderful
Veni, Vidi, Amavi!!!! Wonderful coffee and baked goods. Gnarley marley and cake were amazing!!!!
Great place you need to go there soon.

My husband and I are new to the area. We drove past this quaint coffee shop a week prior and decided to go back and try it. I'm so glad we did! We met Will (the owner), his girlfriend and Mother. We enjoyed not only delicious baked goods and an iced coffee, but also wonderful conversation for over an hour with the 3 of them. The sitting area is very comfortable and Will told us some stories of his decor. He said each item has a story. I love that!  We really enjoyed our time there and will be back!

Will was kind enough to run through his drinks and helped me pick the Gnarly Marley, which was delightful. The seating area was comfortable and the overall vibe was warm and welcoming. I will certainly be back the next time I'm in town!
I go to a lot of coffee shops. By far the best atmosphere and the coffee is great.
Very cute place! Awesome chicken salad sandwich and banana bread to go along with the coffee.
The coffee was DELICIOUS and I ordered a cilantro lime chicken sandwich which was also delicious. Will definitely go again, and again, and again!
Scrumptious cappuccino, delectable banana bread. But the service was the best part
Great coffee, drinks, and fresh baked pastries. True coffee house with comfy couches and home-like vibe.
Love their red velvet cookies
their coffee is AMAZING

This place is a wonderful, cozy hideout of a coffee shop. Good tea and coffee choices, as well as some tasty pastry treats. I had a cold Chai tea latte and it was quite good. Cozy indoor seating for a small group, or a couple couples. Free wifi, outdoor seating that is covered (but not for July heat). I'll be back.

Stumbled across this cute coffee spot, great atmosphere with great people. Met the owner Will and also Anna who works there made me this amazing coffee today called the Milky Way, they also have fresh baked items there and I got a strawberry cheese danish, and it was also really good. If you're looking for great coffee, fresh baked goods, friendly faces, try them out.
Really amazing coffee and pastries !! The owner was really awesome and nice , I will definitely return when I'm back in town . It was one of the best experiences I have had in a coffee house .
Good coffee!
Amazing scones. And the owner is extraordinarily kind. Next time,  I must try the coffee.

I just ordered from here for the first time through ubereats and omg 10/10! I got an iced white chocolate mocha latte with oat milk and got my mom a sugar free caramel latte with almond milk. My mom and I both said we were not expecting for it to be so good I drank mine so fast. I definitely recommend trying this place out and supporting small businesses! I will for sure be ordering again!
This is the best hidden gem in Kannapolis! Great coffee, cozy atmosphere, and great service!!

Pretty disappointed by what I received.  The product I received, 3 out of 4 were nothing like they were described or depicted.

Ordered a milky way Latte cold, white chocolate cold, banana nut bread slice and cherry Danish.  The cherry Danish was smashed and all the filling was on the paper, the only saving grace was the banana nut bread.

Why is there only one size for cold??

I'm posting photos to show what they looked like in comparison to what I received.

Every visit I am welcomed by friendly smiles , delicious drinks and relaxing atmosphere.
A true hidden gem off main Street.

First of all, I would like to say that the U.S.A. is the worst when it comes to making cappuccinos. I have tried local coffee shops, medium, and larger franchises from different parts of the country (I travel often) and they all prepared terrible cappuccinos. But for some reason I decided to give yours a try, and I don't regret it! It wasn't the best cappuccino (compared to other countries), but it is the best one if we're comparing it to the coffee shops in this country. You don't know how happy you have made me lol. Keep up the good work! I'll be coming back!
My favorite local one stop shop for coffee, goodies, conversation...everything you need to start your day! The owners are incredible people and the vibe here is like no other!!! Best. Place. Ever.

I purchased a tres leches  cake 12/29 and when I got it home and was serving it to my family, I noticed a strange smell.  It was ALCOHOL!  I could NOT believe it! Needless to say the cake was trashed and that was ruined. So much for the celebration dessert...
11/10 would come back and will come back! Great atmosphere, great coffee and great people. Coffee was rich and made just the way you like it with conversations just as rich.
Owners are friendly drinks are amazing
Will and the shop are awesome! Highly recommend
I don't usually write reviews but this place is so GOOD I have to share. The customer service was awesome even though delivery, and the baked goods are great, and the coffee just hits different

Great coffee options! Coffee was amazing and the pastries were to die for. Customer service was exemplary. The person behind the counter helped me pick out what I wanted and made an excellent choice. Definitely will return again. It has a very homey "I just popped over to my friends house for coffee" feel.
Will the owner was wonderful very down to earth I loved having a conversation with him I will definitely be back
Always a great experience! Super friendly staff and yummy drinks. Loved the cheddar, bacon, chive scone as well.
Maravillosa atencion, ambiente super acojedor, y lo mejor con Sabor Venezolano
Fantastic service! Great coffee
Best Cafe experience I've ever had. Really makes you feel welcome.

Thank you we had the best time.
The coffee was wonderful. Cocoa and I will be back. This is a wonderful little coffee shop. The snacks are great the coffee is perfect. Please help put this place on the map..... Animals are also welcome.

The coffee is delicious and the customer service is amazing. Had a great conversation with the owner Will. He was inviting, kind and took pride in not only good coffee but good service. I will definitely be going back and bringing people with me!

Excelente!! El mejor cafe de Kanappolis. La atencion de los duenos es la mejor. Tenian un evento para ninos donde Mi hijo se pudo montar en un camion de bomberos y compartir un rato con ellos. Volveremos pronto.

Good afternoon,

My wife and I really enjoyed this place. The drinks and pastries were great but the employees were even greater. They were very kind and attentive.
One of.our favorites
Excelente
Customer service was great and everyone helping me was fun and informative. Of course there were great drinks as well!!

We had a meeting there and it was wonderful the owner cooked cookies and banana nut bread it was great and made drinks (no alcohol) for us he was a great host for us.
Thank you from
Raymond Allen
Great customer service can not say enough good things
Un lugar maguico y maravilloso
This place is amazing! Coffee is amazing, pastries are incredible. Great conversation and service. Definitely a must visit!!!
This place is amazing! The coffee, service, and atmosphere is awesome!! Deffinetly a new favorite!!
Excellent customer service. They made me a dairy free tres leche ice coffee drink- that wasn't on the menu. It was delicious!!
We placed an order with doordash, and we have a new favorite coffee place. Thanks for the great drinks, cookies and amazing service.
I wish I had found this place sooner! The Hibiscus tea and blueberry muffins are delicious! Very warm and welcoming establishment. A great place to chill and enjoy good food, drink and company.
If you like your coffee sweet.. you have to try the turtle cheesecake cappuccino!
Excelente
Great staff and service
It felt like so welcoming and I suggest that everyone in the area experience it!! Great coffee and tea!

I had an absolutely wonderful first time experience! Will, Kristie, and Amanda were so kind, warm, and inviting. Their hibiscus tea and s'mores latte was to die for! I will definitely be coming back and making this my new regular coffee shop!
This place prides itself on customer satisfaction. Would recommend this coffee shop to anyone who lives in or is rolling through Kannapolis

The owner, Will, is personable, professional, and an overall gem. They let me sample my coffee before committing to a drink and took time to understand what I wanted. He also bakes amazing cupcakes. 10/10. Also hosts events and puts back into the community. Can not speak highly enough about this coffee shop.
Will and staff are very attentive and service is outstanding! Support locally owned small businesses! Plus the backed goods are amazing! God Bless!
Great cupcakes and coffee. Owner is super friendly
Fell in love with the atmosphere and their work. They don't treat you like a customer but like a long lost friend. Will definitely be coming back.

Quirky and delicious! The coffee and chai were superb! I purchased a chai with almond milk iced and the owner made it perfectly! The owners were pleasant and helped us pick out some afternoon desserts as well! Highly recommend for coffee, chai or dessert. Will be returning for more...

Owner is super nice, I am not a coffee drinker but my wife loves it.  I usually have a strawberry dolewip or a strawberry hibiscus lemonade which are awesome.  They also have homade cupcakes which I have to get every time I am there.
You should try them out, you will not be disappointed.
Will is good people
Pleaseee if your in the area stop by. The BEST smoothies and dessert
Thanks Chef Wii!!
The owner is very welcoming and they have some amazing specialty lattes and teas

Easily the best coffee and baked goods shop in kannapolis. The owner makes sure that EVERY customer is taken carw of to the fullest. The drinks are amazing, the choices are numerous, and the cakes are perfect every single time. You just cant find a better spot for a caffeine and sugar.
Love this place! Love Will, the owner and his sweet lady, Amanda! The atmosphere is so welcoming. It feels like home, a place you never want to leave.
Felt right at home. Good coffee.
Its a great place .good costumer service
Great friendly environment best coffee ask for the bob marley
Great place and great coffee. Love the owner he is so nice.....

Yummy breads and pastries
The drinks are fabulous I'm obsessed with the immune tea! So tasty and fresh and loving the organic vibe
S'mores latte!  Bangin!

Very inviting visit; very cozy Coffee Shop with tons of personality.  The staff was impeccably knowledgeable and kind and Will (the Owner) was very personable. Kannapolis is growing quickly but we will never change so choose this cozy spot for the best coffee and service in town! Thanks for the Hospitality and We are looking forward to our next visit!

let me tell you... the atmosphere alone is worth the visit but then you add the dynamic personality of the owner, Will, and the excellent drinks and snacks.... this is THE place to go for cawffee!!! They also offer a plethora of non cawffee options, like the Hibiscus Tea....de-lish! While you are there, grab a Keto friendly bagel with Everything on top or a slice of marble cheesecake. I promise you will not be disappointed with either!
Excellent drinks, Service, and staff!

This place is one of the best coffee shops around. The owners are super relaxed and it feels like family when you're here. Even if you aren't a coffee drinker come try some teas or desserts. They have a Take/Leave a book reading area, Piano to play, Netflix to watch, and always a neat event to bring the community together. Absolutely love coming here, it's like my second home.
Great coffee and great atmosphere!
Great coffee and Will is one of the coolest people you'll ever meet.
Great service and the energy is so positive thank you
Will (the owner) is the man!  If you want a great coffee experience, you need to come here.  Good coffee, better person!
Owner is amazing and really makes this little shop feel like a second home! Prices are great and the desserts taste like I'm back home with mom! Definitely need to stop in if you're in the area.
Personable owner and a good space to relax.  Coffee shop/bakery.  Diamond in the rough for sure.

I highly recommend the gnarly Marley!  So yummy! The owner Will is so friendly and down to earth, he even went to the lengths of helping me with my daughters car seat out to my car. We were in a rush but next time I'd like to sit and relax in one of the cozy rooms   My new favorite coffee shop!
Great coffee drinks and homemade goods in a very cozy setting!
Love this place
Friendly service
I am very shy when not with friends. But thought this was really cute and extremely homely! Will definitely stop by again for sure!

Best place i have ever been and really friendly man
Thanks Will for the great coffee and best experience
Home away from home
I love the coffee they serve there
Friendly
I was Dean I had coffee the cake is delicious it's a nice place to go and relax and enjoy your coffee and your peach trees they're open from 6 in the morning to 7 last night
Awesome, relaxing atmosphere! Funny, welcoming, down to earth owner. I've found my new spot!!

I've been passing by here for a few weeks now on the way to drop my daughter off at school, and my husband pointed it out to me. We stopped in today for the first time and were not disappointed at all. The coffee shop is beautiful and has a very welcoming energy. That may have a lot to do with the owner, Will, who was a tremendously gracious host. He gave me and my 3 year old a tour and was wonderful at pointing out the things there for her to do too. Everything in this place seems to be so intentional and it shows, right down to the autograph wall. I am so excited to visit here again when we have some more time. Oh yeah, did I mention my chai was excellent!? Do yourself a favor and stop into this new Kannapolis gem, you absolutely wont regret it.
The frozen smores latte is pretty much the best thing I've ever tasted, and this place is just incredibly cute. Super friendly staff. I can't wait to go back!

Everyone needs to check this place out. Period. One of the best atmospheres for a coffee shop I've ever seen. Owner is super chill and inviting. Make sure you sign the wall when you come!

Oh yeah, the coffee is really good
Not your normal coffee shop. Will makes every person who walks in his door feel special. Go check this place out!!
Absolutely love this place! The coffee is so my better than any chain store out there. The owners are wonderful people who treat everyone like family! I'm going to be a regular!!
Amazing Atmosphere. Very cool setup and great coffee. You need to check this place out.

I love local coffee shops and make it a point to stop by and enjoy the local scene wherever and whenever I can. Plus, the coffee is usually better than big chain coffee shops. My experience here today is the reason why I continue to do so. Not only was the coffee and banana nut muffin great, but I also had the pleasure to meet and talk to Will. He showed me around the shop and explained some of the events that he was putting together. He shared his passion for life, the shop, and the community. He shared some videos of locals that have visited his shop in the few weeks he's been open. I felt a genuine connection to the shop and the local community. I feel like Will is the kind of guy that will give you the shirt off his back. I definitely recommend stopping by for the great coffee and staying a while for the great atmosphere and conversation. Feel free to play the piano. Definitely sign the wall! I'll definitely stop by when I'm in the area again. Will, keep doing great things!

Love this place.  The owners are so sweet and helpful and the fact that it feels like you're hanging out at a friend's house just makes it all the more better.  Plus, for me, it's within walking distance to work so BONUS!
Very friendly owner and wonderful coffee shop. It feels like a home away from home.
Owners of this amazing establishment display a genuine concern for the patrons of their business. Love that they value relationships over sales.

Amazing business! Beautiful interior and kind, welcoming energy to everyone. The owner and his girlfriend have great customer service and offer a wide range of beverages and pastries. Open to community events and offer a space to artists and local vendors to share their craft. Definitely a great growing business!

We went on a Saturday morning and it was quite the experience! I tried their cappuccino and it was really good! So was their mini upside down pineapple cupcakes. The atmosphere is inviting and cozy. We will definitely be coming back.
Wonderful coffee and sweets.  The coffee shop is like being at home and the owner treats you like family. This is my new spot for sure.

I absolutely loved this place! Will and Norkis are so welcoming and such good "hosts." I say hosts because when you walk into the cafe, you get the most home-like feeling. I'm not a coffee drinker at all, but I did have a frozen chocolate beverage with a shot of espresso that was absolutely fantastic! I can't wait to come back to this gem of a place. I have been raving about this cafe to all of my friends and co-workers. Veni Vidi Vici is such an appropriate name for this cafe; I came, I saw, and, in this case, I have been conquered. I can't fully express how much I loved this place.
Fabulous atmosphere. The owner is welcoming and gives everyone a tour. I don't drink coffee... but i had the frozen hot chocolate... and it was wonderful! My 22yo loves their coffee and the prices!
The owner is such a nice person! The drink he made us was amazing! Such a cool atmosphere to hang out at. We didn't want to leave!
Fabulous vibe!  In and out or stay for a while.  Loved it!
Such a cozy place to just hang out and chill, read a book, or even watch a movie. Just by stepping into the place you can see all the hard work that was put into this place to turn it into a cafe!
Warm and inviting atmosphere! Gracious and friendly owner! I WILL be a regular! Yummy frozen chocolate beverage!!!
Inviting atmosphere, great coffee, and delicious desserts. You will not be disappointed!
Great atmosphere and hosts! An excellent new addition to town!  The coffee and pastries are incredible! Nice place to hang out and chat or work, Wi-Fi available!
